page-summaries.my-trips: In the list below there are all your accepted trips. You can view both upcoming and past trips.
page-summaries.invitations: In the list below there are all trips where you are invited to participate. You can accept or reject the invitations.
page-summaries.my-organized-trips: In the list below there are all your organized trips. You can edit these trips.
page-summaries.all-trips: In the list below there are all trips organized by all users.

alerts.login-info: Please log in using your email and password
alerts.login-failed: Wrong email or password. Please try again

trip-list.empty-list: No trips match the selected criteria
